name: The Guardian (Laugic)
description:
Defeat The Guardian, the protector of the Orb of Truth, in this difficult boss fight arena!

Controls:

WASD- Move

Left Click- Shoot at the mouse position

Right Click- Teleport to the mouse location (after acquiring Blink)

--------

Made in 48 hours for a game jam at WPI by Alexander 'Laugic' Hebert (Code, art, and music), with some music tracks by Turquoise https://soundcloud.com/turqo
